```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(moderndive)
library(ggplot2)
```

##### load early_january_weather dataset

```{r}
data("early_january_weather")
```

##### names/values of important variables in early_january_weather

```{r}
get_all_vars(early_january_weather)
```


```{r}
nrow(early_january_weather)
```


```{r}
ncol(early_january_weather)
```

 
```{r}
temp <- early_january_weather$temp 
```

```{r}
mean(temp)
```

```{r}
sd(temp)
```

##### make a scatterplot 

```{r}
ggplot(data = early_january_weather, aes (x = time_hour, y = temp, color = humid)) + geom_point()
ggsave("temp vs time_hour by humid.png")
```
